summary:
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list.

We have file-level metadata: path src/aiortc/codecs/g711.py. It defines codecs for G.711 audio (PCM, PCMA, PCMU). Provide decoder and encoder classes.

We need to summarize file responsibility: implement G.711 audio codecs (PCM, A-law, mu-law) for real-time communication, providing encoding/decoding of audio frames.

Business intent: enable audio processing in WebRTC/VoIP applications, allowing conversion between raw PCM and G.711 formats for transmission.

Keywords: G.711, PCM, A-law, mu-law, encoder, decoder, audio codec, real-time communication, WebRTC, VoIP, audio frame, sample rate, packetization.

Make sure not to list function names verbatim. Provide summary, business_intent, keywords list.

Return JSON object.

Let's craft.

Summary: This module implements G.711 family audio codecs, providing encoder and decoder classes for raw PCM, PCMA (A-law), and PCMU (µ-law). It handles conversion between linear PCM samples and G.711 byte streams, integrates with AV frames and jitter buffer for real‑time media pipelines.

Business intent: Facilitate audio encoding/decoding in real‑time communication systems such as WebRTC or VoIP, allowing interoperability with telephony equipment and efficient transmission of voice data.

Keywords list: ["G.711", "PCM", "A-law", "mu-law", "audio codec", "encoder", "decoder", "real-time communication", "WebRTC", "VoIP", "audio frame", "sample conversion", "packetization"]

Return JSON.

Make sure JSON keys exactly as required: summary, business_intent, keywords.

Let's output.assistantfinal{{"summary": "The module implements the G.711 family of audio codecs, offering encoder and decoder classes for raw PCM, PCMA (A-law) and PCMU (µ-law). It converts between linear PCM samples and G.711 byte streams and integrates with AV frames and jitter buffering for real‑time media pipelines.", "business_intent": "Provide audio encoding and decoding capabilities for real‑time communication platforms such as WebRTC and VoIP, enabling interoperability with telephony equipment and efficient voice data transmission.", "keywords": ["G.711", "PCM", "A-law", "mu-law", "audio codec", "encoder", "decoder", "real-time communication", "WebRTC", "VoIP
